name: The EICAR Encoder
author: todb <todb@metasploit.com>
description:
This encoder merely replaces the given payload with the EICAR test string.
        Note, this is sure to ruin your payload.

        Any content-aware firewall, proxy, IDS, or IPS that follows anti-virus
        standards should alert and do what it would normally do when malware is
        transmitted across the wire.
arch: x86, x86_64, x64, mips, mipsle, mipsbe, mips64, mips64le, ppc, ppce500v2, ppc64, ppc64le, cbea, cbea64, sparc, sparc64, armle, armbe, aarch64, cmd, php, tty, java, ruby, dalvik, python, nodejs, firefox, zarch, r

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module
